# Griffe

> Signatures for entire Python programs. Extract the structure, the frame, the skeleton of your project, to generate API documentation or find breaking changes in your API.

## Usage

- [Home](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/index.md)
- [Getting started](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/getting-started/index.md)
- [Installation](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/installation/index.md)
- [Introduction](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/introduction/index.md)
- [User guide](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/index.md)
- [Loading](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/loading/index.md)
- [Navigating](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/navigating/index.md)
- [Serializing](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/serializing/index.md)
- [Checking](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/checking/index.md)
- [Extending](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/extending/index.md)

## Recommendations

- [Docstrings](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/recommendations/docstrings/index.md)
- [Public APIs](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/recommendations/public-apis/index.md)
- [Python code](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/recommendations/python-code/index.md)

## How-to

- [Parse docstrings](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/how-to/parse-docstrings/index.md)
- [Selectively inspect objects](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/how-to/selectively-inspect/index.md)
- [Set objects' docstring style](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/how-to/set-docstring-styles/index.md)
- [Set Git info on objects](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/how-to/set-git-info/index.md)
- [Support custom decorators](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/guide/users/how-to/support-decorators/index.md)

- [API checks](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/checks/index.md)

- [Docstrings](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/docstrings/index.md)

- [Expressions](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/expressions/index.md)

- [Finder](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/finder/index.md)
- [Git utilities](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/git/index.md)
- [Helpers](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/helpers/index.md)
- [Loaders](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/loaders/index.md)
- [Loggers](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/loggers/index.md)
- [Models](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/index.md)
- [Serializers](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/serializers/index.md)
- [Models](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/docstrings/models/index.md)
- [Parsers](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/docstrings/parsers/index.md)
- [Alias](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/alias/index.md)
- [Attribute](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/attribute/index.md)
- [Class](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/class/index.md)
- [Function](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/function/index.md)
- [Module](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/reference/api/models/module/index.md)

## Extensions

- [Built-in](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/built-in/index.md)
- [dataclasses](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/built-in/dataclasses/index.md)
- [Official](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/index.md)
- [autodocstringstyle](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/autodocstringstyle/index.md)
- [inherited-docstrings](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/inherited-docstrings/index.md)
- [public-redundant-aliases](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/public-redundant-aliases/index.md)
- [public-wildcard-imports](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/public-wildcard-imports/index.md)
- [pydantic](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/pydantic/index.md)
- [runtime-objects](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/runtime-objects/index.md)
- [sphinx](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/sphinx/index.md)
- [typingdoc](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/typingdoc/index.md)
- [warnings-deprecated](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/official/warnings-deprecated/index.md)
- [Third-party](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/index.md)
- [docstring-inheritance](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/docstring-inheritance/index.md)
- [fastapi](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/fastapi/index.md)
- [fieldz](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/fieldz/index.md)
- [generics](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/generics/index.md)
- [inherited-method-crossrefs](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/inherited-method-crossrefs/index.md)
- [modernized-annotations](https://mkdocstrings.github.io/griffe/extensions/third-party/modernized-annotations/index.md)
